page.title: 17THE GUIDE CAMP
page.content: On Friday our Guide Company went camping at Primrose Hill in Scawby. We set off at 5.30 pm and when we arrived we put our tents up and prepared our sleeping bags. At 8 o'clock we had our supper and got ready for bed. Next morning we cooked bacon and beans on our camp fire. After breakfast we made up our bedding rolls and cleaned our tents and then we went for our activities. There are several things to pick from but I chose shooting and printing. After we had finished it was time for tea and then we all gathered round the camp fire for a sing_song. Each patrol had to sing a song or perform a stunt. Next morning it was time to return home so we struck camp early and returned to Barrow after a very happy weekend.
